---
title: IPlistApi.plist_get_real_val method
---

Get the value of a #PLIST_REAL node. This function does nothing if node is not of type #PLIST_REAL

```csharp
public void plist_get_real_val(PlistHandle node, ref double val)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| node | the node |
| val | a pointer to a double variable. |
